mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysShop Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ SHOP_ID , SHOP_NM , SHOP_TP_CD , FO_EXPSR_YN , OTLT_SHOP_YN , DRTSTOR_DRDL_SHOP_YN , VIRTL_SHOP_YN , WRHUS_YN , USE_YN , SORT_SEQ , SPOT_NM , RPRSTIV_NM , SIDO_CD , SIGUNGU_CD , LTTD , LGTD , OPEN_DATE , SHOP_WIDTH_DSCR , SHOP_RPRST_IMG_URL , SHOP_URL , PARKNG_PSB_YN , PARKNG_UPODNL_INFO_CONT , TRNSPORT_INFO_CONT , NATION_CD , POST_NO , BASE_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , CTY_NM , LCLTY_NM , SHOP_TEL_NATION_NO , SHOP_TEL_AREA_NO , SHOP_TEL_TLOF_NO , SHOP_TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , RPRSTIV_MOBIL_NATION_NO , RPRSTIV_MOBIL_AREA_NO , RPRSTIV_MOBIL_TLOF_NO , RPRSTIV_MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , BSN_CHRGER_NM , BSN_CHRGER_MOBIL_NATION_NO , BSN_CHRGER_MOBIL_AREA_NO , BSN_CHRGER_MOBIL_TLOF_NO , BSN_CHRGER_MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , WKDY_OPER_BEG_HHMM , WKDY_OPER_END_HHMM , SAT_OPER_BEG_HHMM , SAT_OPER_END_HHMM , HLDY_OPER_BEG_HHMM , HLDY_OPER_END_HHMM , CPN_PRM_NO , INSTAGRAM_ACSS_TOKN_ID , ASGN_PRIO_RANK_SECT_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_SHOP WHERE 1 = 1 AND SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysShop Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_SHOP WHERE 1 = 1 AND SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
